name: Untitled Glass Game
description:
Greetings!

Untitled Glass Game is a minimalist puzzle game where we try to break all the glasses on the screen

Does It Have a Story?

No dude, making a story game on a game jam is so boring.

This game was made in 48 hours with Give damage, take will be harmed theme for Greeny Game Jam hosted by METU GATES, ODTÜ Tasarım Topluluğu and Gazi DOTT

Controls

Activate Breaker: LMB
Start Game (On Main Screen): Z
Next Level: X
Chill: Your Brain

Who Play This Game?

• Those who like to minimal puzzle games
• People in the Greeny Game Jam
• Angry people who want to break glass
• Deaf people
• My friends who are curious about the game i made (Nobody)

System Requirements

You can even play on a Glass
